attributes.action: Protect cabin crew on flights to destinations such as Ibiza
attributes.additional_details: Aviation safety, the safety of cabin crew and other passengers.
attributes.background: having undercover officers or security on flights to destinations like Ibiza as it is a safety issue as people are too rowdy, cabin crew get attacked and hit. Female cabin crew get groped, and all crew get verbally abused.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about law enforcement on international flights are an operational matter for the relevant authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
